description:
Atobe and Niou volunteer to play the first shuffle match against doubles pair No. 9 Oshitari and No. 10 Mori. Niou combats Oshitari`s powerful serves shot from the staggering height of 226cm by taking on Tezuka`s appearance and using his arm-straining Zero Degree Serve. The middle schoolers take control of the service game. They just need to win one more...
Just then, Oshitari`s cold gaze pierces Atobe! In the face of Oshitari the Mental Assassin`s pressure, Atobe... and Niou...
Source: crunchyroll
